solution_line_template: First find the total number of basil leaves: {basil_pots} pots * {basil_leaves_per_pot} leaves/pot = <<{basil_pots}*{basil_leaves_per_pot}={basil_leaves}>>{basil_leaves} leaves
Then find the total number of rosemary leaves: {rosemary_pots} pots * {rosemary_leaves_per_pot} leaves/pot = <<{rosemary_pots}*{rosemary_leaves_per_pot}={rosemary_leaves}>>{rosemary_leaves} leaves
Then find the total number of thyme leaves: {thyme_pots} pots * {thyme_leaves_per_pot} leaves/pot = <<{thyme_pots}*{thyme_leaves_per_pot}={thyme_leaves}>>{thyme_leaves} leaves

Then add the number of each type of leaf to find the total number of leaves: {basil_leaves} leaves + {rosemary_leaves} leaves + {thyme_leaves} leaves = <<{basil_leaves}+{rosemary_leaves}+{thyme_leaves}={total_leaves}>>{total_leaves} leaves
